description: Tests the auto-merging settings of your Identity Resolution Job without merging your data. It randomly selects a sample of matching groups from the existing matching results, and applies the automerging settings that you provided. You can then view the number of profiles in the sample, the number of matches, and the number of profiles identified to be merged. This enables you to evaluate the accuracy of the attributes in your matching list. You can't view which profiles are matched and would be merged.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique name of the domain.

parameters.name: Consolidation
parameters.description: A list of matching attributes that represent matching criteria. A list of matching criteria. (list) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: ConflictResolution
parameters.description: How the auto-merging process should resolve conflicts between different profiles. RECENCY: Uses the data that was most recently updated. SOURCE: Uses the data from a specific source. For example, if a company has been aquired or two departments have merged, data from the specified source is used. If two duplicate profiles are from the same source, then RECENCY is used again. SourceName (string) --- The ObjectType name that is used to resolve profile merging conflicts when choosing SOURCE as the ConflictResolvingModel.

nested_params.name: ConflictResolvingModel
nested_params.description: How the auto-merging process should resolve conflicts between different profiles.

nested_params.name: SourceName
nested_params.description: The ObjectType name that is used to resolve profile merging conflicts when choosing SOURCE as the ConflictResolvingModel.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the domain.

nested_items.name: NumberOfMatchesInSample
nested_items.description: The number of match groups in the domain that have been reviewed in this preview dry run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfProfilesInSample
nested_items.description: The number of profiles found in this preview dry run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfProfilesWillBeMerged
nested_items.description: The number of profiles that would be merged if this wasn't a preview dry run.
